participant_1.name: Jovannie
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and sociable, Jovannie enjoys engaging with others and sharing her interests.
participant_1.background: My sisters are visiting this weekend, so I am looking forward to spending time with them and making new memories. My name is Jovannie and I am 19. I don't mind the hot weather, but it's hard to keep my hair from frizzing. I'm into music, but my dog, Socks, doesn't seem to care. I work as a personal trainer, 5 days a week.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Lila expresses herself through art and dance, and values freedom of expression.
participant_2.background: My boss doesn't know that I'm an art student, but I'm hoping to show him my portfolio soon. My hardest decision was whether to give up my lasagna addiction or travel to the UK. Dancing is my passion. I rely on public transportation because my eyes are too weak to drive. I get to show off my long fingernails.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for fun?
I love to dance, it's my passion!
That's awesome! I love to dance as well. What type of dancing do you like to do?
I like to do all types of dancing, but I'm especially passionate about ballet.
I love ballet! It's so graceful and beautiful. I used to take ballet lessons when I was younger.
That's so cool! Do you still dance?
I don't have time to dance anymore, but I still love to watch it.
I understand, it's definitely a time consuming activity.
What's your favorite thing about dancing?
I love the feeling of freedom and expression that I get when I dance.
I can definitely relate to that! Dancing is such a great way to let loose and have fun.
I'm glad you feel that way! Do you have any upcoming dance performances?
No, I don't have any upcoming dance performances. I wish I did though!
You should look into taking some dance classes! It's a great way to stay active and have fun.
I might have to do that! Thanks for the suggestion
